mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROJECT ( F_PROJECT_ID, F_PROJECT_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE, F_COPYRIGHTS ) VALUES ( #{projectId}, #{projectName}, #{title}, #{description}, #{note}, #{copyrights} )
mapper.select: SELECT F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note", F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights" FROM T_PROJECT WHERE F_PROJECT_ID = #{projectId}
